0.title: F-16AJ: Cover-boy
0.description: The export version of the F-16A jet-fighter designed for Japan Air Self-Defense Force comes as the first 4th gen aircraft in the Japanese tech tree.

1.title: 96K6 Pantsir-S1: The Ultimatum
1.description: The Pantsir-S1 surface-to-air missile and artillery system capable of tracking and killing several air targets comes as a new top-tier SPAAG for the Soviets.

2.title: French Navy: destroyer Aigle
2.description: The Aigle destroyer sporting deadly cannons and great torpedoes comes as the first French ship to be added to the game in a special early access pack!

0.title: Pages of History (March)
0.description: For the whole month, you will have 8 tasks available to you one by one. Completion of each task will award you with a trophy containing a reward, while completing all tasks will award you with a unique in-game player icon.

1.title: World War Mode news
1.description: We would like to present to you the next batch of changes in the “World War” game mode and inform you about the upcoming opportunity to test your skill in historical battles.

2.title: Pages of History (February)
2.description: For the whole month, you will have 8 tasks available to you one by one. Completion of each task will award you with a trophy containing a reward, while completing all tasks will award you with a unique in-game player icon

0.title: War Thunder "Apex Predators" - Changelog
0.description: Brand new Rank VIII 4th generation aircraft with the iconic trio of F-16, MiG-29 and Tornado! Selection of over 40 new and updated models of aircraft, ground vehicles and navy. New models for ship crew with reworked voice overs for navy events, drop-tanks mechanics, two new locations and as always, a long list of bug fixes and smaller updates and changes! Prepare yourself, Apex Predators have arrived at War Thunder!

1.title: Update  2.23.1.41
1.description: MiG-21 F-13 — ballistic calculator has been added for rockets. (...)

2.title: Update 2.23.1.33 (Xbox, Playstation - Server update)
2.description: The chance of radar lock transfer on nearby targets has been decreased, which means more stable target tracking.
